all_concepts: High reliability due to absence of mechanical moving parts
Good chemical compatibility thanks to fused glass technology
Easy replacement of electronic sensor without emptying or depressurizing the plant
Direct mounting onto various types of compressors and tanks
technical_specs: The optical level switch LC-PS has been designed for use in level monitoring applications for the control of low viscosity liquids.
When the liquid reaches the sensor dome, a big amount of the light emitted is lost in the liquid and the sensor senses its presence.
natural_questions: What is the maximum pressure for LC-PS?
Which refrigerants are compatible with LC-PS?

key_concepts: High reliability due to absence of mechanical moving parts
Good chemical compatibility thanks to fused glass technology
Easy replacement of electronic sensor without emptying or depressurizing the plant
Direct mounting onto various types of compressors and tanks
iconic_quotes: The optical level switch LC-PS has been designed for use in level monitoring applications for the control of low viscosity liquids.
When the liquid reaches the sensor dome, a big amount of the light emitted is lost in the liquid and the sensor senses its presence.

qa_pairs.question: What pressure range does LC-PS support?
qa_pairs.answer: The optical level control unit LC-PS supports up to 46bar. This makes it suitable for use in a variety of applications, including compressor and refrigeration systems.

qa_pairs.question: How does the electronic sensor work?
qa_pairs.answer: The electronic sensor uses an infrared-ray emitter and an optical receiver to detect the presence of liquid. When the liquid reaches the sensor dome, a big amount of the light emitted is lost in the liquid and the sensor senses its presence.

qa_pairs.question: What are the benefits of using LC-PS?
qa_pairs.answer: The optical level control unit LC-PS offers several benefits, including high reliability, good chemical compatibility, and easy replacement of electronic sensors. It is also designed for direct mounting onto various types of compressors and tanks.

qa_pairs.question: How do I select between LC-PS and other products?
qa_pairs.answer: When selecting a product, consider the specific requirements of your application. LC-PS is suitable for use in level monitoring applications for the control of low viscosity liquids. It is also customizable with delays on request.

qa_pairs.question: What are the technical specifications of LC-PS?
qa_pairs.answer: The optical level control unit LC-PS has a supply voltage range of 230VAC@50Hz / 115VAC@60Hz / 24 VAC@50/60Hz / 24VDC depending on the selected model. It also has an electronic protection transient over-voltage protection, and a solid-state output normally open or normally closed in air.

natural_questions: What is the maximum pressure for LC-PS?
Which refrigerants are compatible with LC-PS?
file_metadata.summary: The optical level control unit LC-PS is designed for use in level monitoring applications for the control of low viscosity liquids. It offers high reliability, good chemical compatibility, and easy replacement of electronic sensors.
